Class XmlUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.publicalerts.cap.XmlUtil

  • public class XmlUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods working with org.w3c.dom.Documents.

        Writes the given document to the given writer.

        document - the document to write

        indent - number of spaces to indent, null means don't indent
